data: GI SURG (HIPEC) Hyperthermic Intraperitoneal Intra Operative Regimen I or II - prototyp
Pre Op or SDC Nurse to Initiate this PowerPlan
Have spill kit and protocol available
Select either Regimen I or Regimen II
Physician to use Ideal Body Weight to calculate chemotherapy doses
460 mg/m2, intraperitoneal, once oncology, administer over: 30 minute, drug form: syringe-inj
10 mg/m2, intraperitoneal, once oncology, administer over: 60 minute, drug form: syringe-inj
